title: Pinnacles National Park: Climbing
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Climbing               Climbing      Pinnacles National Park offers a variety of climbing routes that range from easy topropes to the multi-pitch climbs along Machete Ridge. If you've never climbed at Pinnacles and you're planning a trip. please take some time to read our safety advisory and general faq. If you'll be coming during January - July, please take a look at our raptor advisories to ensure that you avoid sensitive areas. Enjoy a safe trip!
